name: Vampiric Bullet Hell
description:
You are a vampyr, one of the oldest ones in fact. For centuries you've roamed the Earth, never feeling fullfilled. Then it hit you, mortal life is key to purpose. You've explored many a ruin, some completely empty, others full of old guardians, in search of a cure. Finally you arrived to an old Lyrish tomb rumoured to contain what you seek. As you delve deeper, the unstable walls trap you within...

Enjoy the Vampiric Bullet Hell!

Fast paced 3D arena shooter. Balance the level of your health and slay your enemies to survive to the end and find the cure for your Vampýr affliction. Reaching zero health results in death, reaching 100% results in something else…*

Controls

  • Movement - WASD/Arrow keys
  • Fire - Left mouse button
  • Melee - E
  • Jump - Space
  • Dash - Shift (costs health to use)
  • Menu - Escape - adjust volume and mouse sensitivity

*Once you reach the crystal door, your health will start draining, be sure to damage enemies to heal yourself (shooting enemies spawns red healing orbs).

Reaching 100% health leads to Boiling Blood - this raises your speed and damage, but also makes your health drain faster, until you reach 50% health.

Dashing drains your health, use it at your own risk.
